name: fabric-get
title: Get
description: This activity fetches data by key from fabric ledger
author: Yueming Xu

settings.name: keyName
settings.description: name of the composite key used to retrieve data

settings.name: attributes
settings.description: list of json-path for attributes used to construct composite key

settings.name: query
keysOnly
settings.description: Fetch specified composite keys only, not the state.

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: keys or JSON objects that specify query parameters

inputs.name: privateCollection
inputs.description: name of private collection, or blank if not private data

inputs.name: pageSize
inputs.description: number of records in a page if use pagination, or 0 to return all records

inputs.name: bookmark
inputs.description: starting bookmark for this page if use pagination

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: serialized JSON string of the result, or error message

outputs.name: bookmark
outputs.description: bookmark for next page when pagination is used

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: keys and JSON object values corresponding to the retrieved states or composite keys
